orders.text: Move to join Corps
Advance south on Telegraph Road and seize the crossing over Long Creek
Move to Mt Carmel Church
Move to Mt Carmel Church
Advance to the north side of Ox Ford and defend the right flank of 2 Corps
Move to Anderson Station and defend. Detach Brown from Wilcox to defend Noel's Station
Move to Army HQ
Move to Hanover Courthouse (via entry hex F)
Defend the Chesterfield Bridge and the Railroad Bridge
Cross the North Anna and advance toward Hanover Junction
Defend the bridgehead at Jericho Mill
Capture Noel Station then advance between the North Anna and the Virginia Central Railroad toward Hanover Junction
Cross the river at Jericho Mill; support the advance of 5 Corps along the Virginia Central Railroad
Force a crossing at Ox Ford and link up with 2 Corps
Defend entrenched divisions. Rodes' division is attached
Defend entrenched divisions. Picket's division is attached
Move to defend Hanover Junction
Defend the fords across Little River
Defend the fords across Little River
Screen the right flank of the army; fall back as needed toward Garnett Crossing
Advance to Mt Carmel Church; when all infantry have arrived, cross the North Anna at Jericho Mills
Move to capture the bridges across the North Anna
Move to Mt Carmel Church
Follow the advance of Warren
Follow 2 Corps to the North Anna and capture Ox Ford
Move south to defend Chesterfield bridge and the Railroad bridge
Move to defend Hanover Junction
Move to Anderson Station
Defend Hanover Junction
Wait for remaining division and then move to defend Chesterfield Bridge
Delay the advance of the Union 2 Corps
Delay the advance of the Union 5 Corps
Move to Hanover Junction
